attributes.description:
Controls how wide the grid layout container appears on the page. This determines the overall width of the grid system that holds rows and columns of content.
CSS variable: --wm-grid-layout-width

Controls the vertical spacing between grid rows (horizontal lines of content). This creates breathing room between different rows of grid content.
CSS variable: --wm-grid-layout-row-gap

Controls the internal spacing inside grid columns (the individual cells that hold content). This creates breathing room around the content within each grid cell.
CSS variable: --wm-grid-layout-column-padding
